# Guide

The max retries constant is [`MaxRetries`](../src/main.go#MaxRetries).

The global state variable is [`globalState`](../src/main.go#globalState).

The [`process`](../src/main.go#process) function transforms data.

The [`Config`](../src/main.go#Config) struct holds settings.

The [`Config.Host`](../src/main.go#Config.Host) field stores the hostname.

The [`Config.Validate`](../src/main.go#Config.Validate) method checks validity.

The [`Handler`](../src/main.go#Handler) interface defines message handling.

The [`Handler.Handle`](../src/main.go#Handler.Handle) method processes messages.
